Service Details: - Provides a quarterly online journal intended as an initiative for collaboration and sharing that honours the transformational power of creativity- Presents the opportunity for the free exchange of wisdom gleaned from creative engagement, and invites all ages to contribute their discoveries- Sage-ing is about seeking - satisfying inner gnawing and transforming it to knowing and action- Aging can be alchemy when one allows the realization that to Know Thyself and contribute that knowing to our culture is indeed one of life’s highest purposes- Knowing brings gratitude, grace and integrity that a life deserves- The creative journey into self is a strong aid to health and well-being for the individual and to our culture- This journal exists for all those serious in exploring their creativity, it is a forum for publication and exposure to other artists, both novice and established, and is an easel for any form of artistry undertaken out of personal intuition and imagination
